sourcesContent:
import {
    BusinessPlan, 
    BusinessPlanForm, 
    BusinessPdf,
    ProfilePage, 
    Dashboard, 
    DashboardTable,
    Innovation,  
    NewProject, 
    Calculator,
    InnovationForm,
    InnovationView,
    AdminDashboard,
    AdminInnovation,
    AdminFilling,
    AdminReportPage,
    AdminUsers,
    ProgressListing,
    UserEdit
} from './views';
import { isAdmin } from './constants';

// const Empty = (props) => <div {...props} />
import dashoboardIcon from './../assets/menu/dashboard.png';
import businessIcon from './../assets/menu/business-plan.png';
import innovationIcon from './../assets/menu/innovation.png';
import reportIcon from './../assets/menu/report.png';
import userIcon from './../assets/menu/user.png';

export const routes = isAdmin ? [
    {path: '/', exact:true, component: AdminDashboard  },
    {path: '/innovation-catalogue', exact:true, component: AdminInnovation  },
    {path: '/innovation-catalogue/:id', exact:true, component: InnovationView  },
    {path: '/projects/view/:id', exact:true, component: ProgressListing  },
    {path: '/projects/table/:status', exact:true, component: AdminFilling  },
    {path: '/report', exact:true, component: AdminReportPage },
    {path: '/profile-page', exact:true, component: ProfilePage  },
    {path: '/users', exact:true, component: AdminUsers  },
    {path: '/users/edit/:id', exact:true, component: UserEdit  },
    {path: '/users/create', exact:true, component: UserEdit  },
] :
[
    {path: '/', exact:true, component: Dashboard  },
    {path: '/projects', exact:true, component: DashboardTable },
    {path: '/create-project', exact:true, component: NewProject  },
    {path: '/edit-project/:id', exact:true, component: NewProject  },
    {path: '/create-project/calculator/:id', exact:true, component: Calculator  },
    {path: '/business-plan', exact:true, component: BusinessPlan  },
    {path: '/business-plan/create', exact:true, component: BusinessPlanForm  },
    {path: '/business-plan/edit/:id', exact:true, component: BusinessPlanForm  },
    {path: '/business-plan/view/:id', exact:true, component: BusinessPdf  },
    {path: '/innovation-catalogue', exact:true, component: Innovation  },
    {path: '/innovation-catalogue/edit/:id',  component: InnovationForm  },
    {path: '/innovation-catalogue/view/:id',  component: InnovationView  },
    {path: '/innovation-catalogue/create',  component: InnovationForm  },
    {path: '/profile-page', exact:true, component: ProfilePage  },
];

export const menus = isAdmin ? [
    {icon: dashoboardIcon, name: 'Dashboard', path: '/'},
    {icon: innovationIcon, name: 'Innovation Catalogue', path: '/innovation-catalogue'},
    {icon: reportIcon, name: 'Report', path: '/report'},
    {icon: userIcon, name: 'Researchers', path: '/users'},
] :
[
    {icon: dashoboardIcon, name: 'Dashboard', path: '/'},
    {icon: businessIcon, name: 'Business Plan', path: '/business-plan'},
    {icon: innovationIcon, name: 'Innovation Catalogue', path: '/innovation-catalogue'},
];
